recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Voluptuous Strawberries  & cream finding new ways to use WF strawberry cheesecake to a new level.. I was never a big fan of strawberries until recently I'm really  liking this one ... testing on the Shenray Hadley clone Ni80 Aliens 30watts.. (Updated version for those who don't have (Fa) premium custard feel free to substitute Tpa vanilla custard v2) and for a sweeter strawberry add 1% Inawara shisha strawberry)

reviews.text: Mixed 100ml of this it's absolutely delicious thanks for the recipe best strawberry vape I had in a long time  can't put it down loving it thank you .I did add 1% shisha strawberry
A solid strawberries custard. Rich creamy mouthfeel and a sweet strawberry that it's to vape. You'll easily vape 100ml and not realize it!
